ygData.subject: Re: Subject: groups
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *grin* Shows how much I go to Luclin. (worst expansion yet? in a word... YES.) ... With a Camo and not travelling thru Kithicor at night it s not too bad a
ygData.messageBody:
>The Nexus doesn't go to West Commonlands. It goes to
>North Karana via the Antonica Scion. In which case

*grin* Shows how much I go to Luclin. (worst expansion
yet? in a word... YES.)

>you have to go through East Karana, Highpass,
>and then West Commons. I think it's actually safer

With a Camo and not travelling thru Kithicor at night
it's not too bad a run, but pestering a druid for a
camo and hoping it doesn't wear off is a hassle. The
boat is probabl a better plan. The other option is
shelling the ten plat to get a port from a Druid or
Wizzy to WC. Much faster. :)
